mapper.select: select * from video_play where video_code in (select video_code from history where member_code = #{code}) order by video_regdate desc
select * from video_play where video_code in (select video_code from playlist where member_code = #{code}) order by video_regdate desc
select * from video_play where video_code in (select video_code from good where member_code = #{code}) order by video_regdate desc
select * from video_play where channel_code = #{code} order by video_regdate desc
select * from video_play where video_code in (select video_code from history where member_code = #{code}) and video_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' order by video_regdate desc
mapper.delete: delete from history where member_code = #{member_code} and video_code = #{video_code}
mapper.select: select history_num from history where member_code = #{member_code} and video_code = #{video_code}
mapper.update: update history set history_num = history_num - 1 where history_num > #{num}
